channel.title: CI-Ignore :: Juice's documentation
channel.description: Some special tests require special conditions so we have to ignore them in the CI test. So we can add [IgnoreOnCIFact] or [IgnoreOnCITheory] attribute to specified tests to bypass. using Juice.XUnit; public class EFTest { [IgnoreOnCIFact(TestPriority(99)] public async Task Shoud_run_first() { } [IgnoreOnCITheory(TestPriority(98)] [InlineData("SqlServer")] [InlineData("PostgreSQL")] public async Task Shoud_run_second(string provider) { } } The library can be accessed via Nuget:
